name: A simple job
description:
One last job.

One last job and then I can quit and start a new life.

They said it's going to be an easy one...

They say it all the time.

"A simple job" is a super short (around 5-10 mins) exploration story-driven game created for the I can't write but want to tell a story Jam.

The theme was "Lost" and I wanted to represent it by the feeling of navigating an unknown city neighborhood.

Have fun!

CONTROLS:

WASD- move around

Mouse pointer - look around

mouse left lick - examine/interaction

Shift - run

Esc - menu
